metadata.Title: CVE-2023-46361 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Artifex Software jbig2dec v0.20 was discovered to contain a SEGV vulnerability via jbig2_error at /jbig2dec/jbig2.c.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> null pointer dereference bug listed below contains similar issue as of 2023-11-01, there is no fix available from the jbig2dec developers

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in bionic is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2023-11-01').
